item.description:
Make new friends and enjoy good drinks and food in the heart of Southie!

To my knowledge, this is the first Southie Pub Crawl posted on meetup.

PLEASE CHECK THE BELOW SCHEDULE BEFORE YOU LEAVE AS IT IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE:

1. STADIUM (Boston): $2 Jello Shots, $3 Coors Lites Pints, $3 LinenKugels Oktoberfest - 3:00 to 5:00 PM (This stop is two hours so you can consume tons of jello shots)

2. STATS: $3 Brooklyn and $5 ScrewDrivers - 5:00 to 6:00 PM

3. PLAYWRIGHT: $3 Coors Lite, $3.50 Miller High Life, $4 Bud Lite - 6:00 PM - 8:00 PM

4. BOSTON BEER GARDEN: 1/2 priced appetizers - 8:00PM onward

 

 

 

WALKING: I recommend getting off at the Andrew Station stop on the Red Line and walking toward Stadium. The reason for only four stops is that the bars are spread out. From Andrew to Boston Beer Garden is 1.3 miles. To get back to the Red Line, Andrew and Broadway are both 1.3 miles which is equidistant but I recommend Broadway since it's better lit.

AFTER PARTY: You can branch off and head to the L Street Tavern or meander back toward the intersection of Broadway and Dorchester and check out other bars Junction, Blackthorne or Tom's English Cottage.

COVER: No cover charges

DRINK SPECIALS: Several bars have suggested drink specials but the specifics may not be available till the day of the event

CAPACITY ISSUES: We may put some bars over capacity. If you can't get in, simply wait till they let you in or move to the next bar.

LIST OF BARS: Bring the schedule with you in case you need to catch up with us.

DATING: This is not a dating event.

LINES: I do not anticipate lines but if there are lines, you can either wait, or head to the next bar.

DOUBLE BOOKING: Only RSVP once so I can maintain and accurate head count.

ORGANIZERS: Please post this on other sites and let me know. The more the merrier.

FACEBOOK: Please post this as an event on FB and invite your friends.
item.name: Southie Pub Crawl - $2 Jello Shots - $3 Beers
